Webinar: Is Testing the Weakest Link in Continuous Integration and DevOps?
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
To be a digital business disruptor, your secret weapon is to gain speed using a formidable continuous delivery capability with quality built in. But for continuous delivery to be achievable, you'll have to change your testing practices to be more agile and continuous, or you will fail miserably in your mission.
In this session, you will learn:
- What your new testing strategy should be in terms of process, people, and technology. - How to leverage automation to build quality and speed into every step of the delivery process. - How to align your testing practices to be agile without making it an end in itself.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
